about_the_game:
This soundtrack for There's Always a Madman: Bring the Thunder includes two versions of the game's title track "Take Shelter."

1. The title track "Take Shelter" that plays on the title screen and includes some sound effects of thunder and laughter

2. The title track "Take Shelter" that plays during the game and DOES NOT include the thunder and laughter sound effects

Note that this only contains these two tracks from the game. It is not a complete soundtrack of all music in the game. This is the only music from the game for sale.

content_descriptors.notes: While the game "There's Always a Madman: Bring the Thunder" contains some violence and sexual innuendo, the theme song is much more generalized. As such, please note that it does have some lyrics that make reference to violence but is largely on par with what you would find in a James Bond theme song. If you have any doubts about the subject matter, you can listen to the theme song for yourself on the title screen of the free demo.
